title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.75 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.75 - General

State Regulations

The foregoing designations are not to be construed to
limit the power of the board to make such special designations of agents as may
be necessary to effectuate the purposes of FLFLPA and, where applicable, SERA, nor shall the foregoing designations be construed as limiting the power of the
board at any time to confer upon its agent or agents additional duties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.75

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
